short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for On Fleek Rewards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the On Fleek Rewards Extension and Shop smarter, Kinder with ease.
 
Shopping from your favourite brands doesn’t have to cost the planet - On Fleek Rewards Extension is the must-have extension to Shop smarter. Kinder.
 
Ensure that you can always earn your On Fleek Rewards when you shop with our partner brands by adding On Fleek Rewards Extension to your browser.
 
HOW IT WORKS
 
On Fleek Rewards Extension will let you know when you are visiting a brand’s website that is a partner with us. Simply click “Activate Now” and you can start earning rewards that can contribute to a more sustainable future.
 
DOWNLOAD TODAY
 
Download the On Fleek Rewards Extension to start earning rewards and offsetting your carbon footprint.
 
Sign up to On Fleek Rewards today to take advantage of the simple and easy way of earning rewards now!
